model_answer: The shortcut creation dialog showing the user navigating to the USB drive to pick Kodi.exe occurs when the narrator instructs to add “space then dash P” to make it portable and says “click next and create”. This is mentioned in the time frame of [00:01:26 - 00:01:50] in the audio. Therefore, the correct answer is B.

The answer is D: [00:01:50 - 00:02:20]. The file explorer shows the portable_data folder on the USB drive being emptied at [00:01:50 - 00:02:20], followed by the folder being refilled by copying a fresh set at [00:02:29 - 00:03:20].
